events.comment: after 2 seconds, go to the menu scene
at the beginning for the scene, set music volume and initialize the variable used to load music and sound state
load state  of sound and music and pass it to the global variables
set animation of music and sound button using the global variable
if music is on, play music
update color of play again text
start game scene if the button is clicked
turn music and sound on and off using the buttons
at the beginning initialize variables
set animation of music and sound button using the global variable
the dragon think of a candy that he want really bad
initialize the health bar
start game timer
start playing music if music is on

if the x position of the background is <= then the width of the image, set x position of the backround to be the width of the image just next to the one currently on the screen and basically make the two constantly swap each other
move the background on the x every frame by the value of scroll_speed
move the dragon up and down and play animation
make sure the dragon don't leave the screen
set the position of the bubble to be at the "bubble" point of the dragon
set position of bubble candy
if the dragon is in collision with a candy that he wants, delete the candy, increase the score and think of an other candy and play the gulp sound
if the candy is not what the dragon wants, reduce health and play the burp sound
every x second, create a candy randomly on the Y axis
move candies to the left
if game_timer is >= game_time OR dragon health is <= 0, go to the end scene
toggle music and sound on and off
at the beginning of the scene, update the text to display score and play music
update color of play again text
go back to game scene if the button is clicked
turn music and sound on and off
